short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays absolute instead of relative humidity when searching for 'weather' on Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays absolute instead of relative humidity when searching for 'weather' on Google.

Air humidity is usually given in percent values. This can be misleading, since air's capacity to hold water changes drastically depending on its temperature. If you want to know whether there's more humidity inside your home or outside, the percent value is not really useful. That's why I made this extension. The ideal air humidity for your home is about 8 - 10 grams of water per cubic meter air.

This extension only works if your browser is set to English when searching for the weather of any location on Google and with degrees centigrade selected. Do you want it to work with other websites, languages or with degrees Fahrenheit? Let me know and I will implement it for you.

Contact me via: lyxodius@gmail.com

I hope you enjoy this extension!
Have a happy and healthy life! :)
